ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, 3 tablespoons oil
1 packet Continental Recipe Base Chilli Con Carne
500 g beef rump steak, trimmed, thinly sliced
1 red capsicum, thinly sliced and 1 red onion, halved, thinly sliced
Method: STEP 1: Combine tomato, avocado, coriander, lime juice and ½ tablespoon oil in a bowl. Combine recipe base and 2 tablespoons oil in a large bowl. Add beef, toss to coat. Place capsicum and onion in another large bowl. Add remaining ½ tablespoon oil, toss to coat.

STEP2: Heat a barbecue flat plate, or large non-stick frying pan, over high heat. Add capsicum and onion mixture. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened and slightly charred. Transfer to a bowl. Cover to keep warm.

STEP3: Reduce heat to medium-high. Cook beef, in batches, for 1-2 minutes for medium or until cooked to your liking. Add to capsicum and onion, toss to combine. Prepare tortillas according to packet directions. Serve with beef mixture, tomato avocado salad and fresh lime halves.

ingredients: 400 g canned four bean mix, drained and rinsed
Method: STEP 1: Heat oil in a large saucepan. Add onion, carrot and chorizo, cook for 5 minutes.
STEP2: Stir in Soup Mix and water. Bring to the boil, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
STEP3: Add beans and zucchini. Cook for a further 5 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley and serve with crusty bread.

ingredients: 1/2 cup finely grated Parmesan cheese, plus extra to serve
2 tablespoons fresh dill finely chopped, plus extra for sprinkling
Method: STEP 1: Place the chicken mince, breadcrumbs, egg, Parmesan, dill, parsley, and pepper into a bowl. Using clean hands, mix to combine. Divide the mixture into 12 portions and then roll into balls.

STEP2: Place stock and bay leaf into a large saucepan. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat to a simmer. Add the meatballs and ensure they are completely submerged in the stock. Cook for 6 minutes with the lid on. Stir in risoni and silverbeet. Cook for a further 5-8 minutes or until the risoni is al dente and meatballs are cooked through.
STEP3: Divide among serving bowls. Garnish with extra dill or parsley and parmesan.
